hadiths.text: Yahya b. Sa'id reported this hadith with the same chain of transmitters but with this change:'Ariyya implies that date-palm trees should be donated to the people and then they sell it with a measure of dry dates

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ بَيْعِ الرُّطَبِ بِالتَّمْرِ إِلاَّ فِي الْعَرَايَا
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of selling fresh dates in exchange for dry dates except in the case of 'Araya
